user_instruction: 'Tell John to send me (sarah.connor@investments.com) a summary of our discussion from the Global Business Hub meeting, and remind him to review his Notion for the details.'

formatted_items.content:
Subject: Request for Summary of Global Business Hub Meeting

Hi John,

I hope you’re doing well. Could you please send me (sarah.connor@investments.com) a concise summary of our discussion from the Global Business Hub meeting at your earliest convenience?  
Also, when you have a moment, please review your notes in Notion for the detailed points we covered.

Thank you so much!

Best,  
Sarah

final_output:
Subject: Request for Summary of Global Business Hub Meeting

Hi John,

Also, when you have a moment, please review your notes in Notion for the detailed points we covered.

Thank you so much!

Best,  
Sarah
